boardgame.name: Perdition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Mouth: Abyssal Rift
boardgame.description: Perdition's Mouth: Abyssal Rift is intended to be a new kind of dungeon crawl, one that embraces the European school of game design with clever and elegant mechanisms and emphasizes strategy while minimizing luck. Cooperation, planning, and the enemy response deck eliminate the need for chucking dice, creating a tense combat environment with meaningful decisions! The rondels provide another tactical layer, including the enemy's devious and challenging AI._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The rules allow you to learn to play in 15 minutes, with a typical game round lasting less than ten minutes, even with up to six players, but deep, strategic cooperation will be required for your band of heroes to make it through to the Abyssal Rift and maybe even come out alive._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Perdition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Mouth is designed to be played as a story-supported campaign over several gaming sessions. In the campaign, you have to fight through at least six increasingly challenging scenarios and the level of success during each adventure has a direct effect on the rest of the story. Can you survive the labyrinth of the insectoid god?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: A Small Slice of Essen Still

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: ***NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER*** Game is expected to arrive from the publisher in Q4, 2016. This is for the Kickstarter Edition of the game, with all stretch goals included. The Kickstarter Exclusive Edition is the deluxe version of Perdition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Mouth, available only during the Kickstarter. It will include everything from the Retail Edition, PLUS: 2 standalone scenarios 2 victim miniatures “Witch’s Grotto” add-on: A timed-exclusive mini-expansion about rescuing (or killing) a witch and claiming a powerful artifact, both of which can be used during the main campaign. The Witch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Grotto expansion features: An extra Hero: Aisha, the Uncanny Shapeshifter, including cards, a miniature, etc. A new type of enemy: Tharnix, which boosts nearby insectoids A short standalone campaign of 5 scenarios, one of them designed by Isaac Childres (from Gloomhaven) 1 double-sided extra map board 4 treasure cards, designed by well known game gurus Peter Adkison (Gen Con), Scott Johnson (VtES) and Tristan Hall (Gloom of Kilforth: A Fantasy Quest Game), and illustrated by Matthias Catrein (Dominion). A wound card also designed by Tristan Hall Shipping to be determined when the game arrives from the publisher, but expect this game to be on the heavier side - perhaps 8+ pounds (3.6+ kg). NOTE: I have many add-ons available separately. Please contact me directly for prices.

***NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER*** The game is estimated to be released in Q4, 2016. This is for the Kickstarter Exclusive Edition of Perdition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Mouth: Abyssal Rift _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Gamer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Bargain Bundle._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; It includes the Kickstarter Exclusive Edition of the Perdition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Mouth, with all stretch goals (including the KS Exclusive stretch goals). ALSO RECEIVE THE FOLLOWING ADD-ONS: Hero Trait Cards, the World Book, the Hideout expansion, and the new set of Portcullis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Lever miniatures. This is expected to be pretty heavy - perhaps 11 pounds (5 kg). Shipping to be determined when the game arrives from the publisher.

***NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER*** The game is estimated to be released in Q4, 2016. Bargain Bundle + Would Promo Deck. Shrink unwrapped, otherwise new and contains everything from the KS Bundle. Reserved for user Silverbowen
NIS KS deluxe version with stretch goals which includes Witch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Grotto expansion + wound promo deck + levers and doors. Will accept paypal and Amazon
Retail edition. Prefer payment through my Square store.
kickstart edition. large promo figure cracked in half. The publisher is aware that many arrived. all parts present. Paypal should be made with friends and family option. never played.

Kickstarter Gamer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Bargain Bundle + Printed German Rulebook + Promo _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Zero Sided_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; die + Wound Promo Deck Played just Mission 1-3 once. Shipping via DHL: Germany: 8,50 Euro EU: 20 Euro World: 54 Euro Can combine shipping with other games. Payment: Per Paypal (sending money to friend else fees) or bank transfer.

This has been punched/bagged but otherwise unplayed. GAMER’S BARGAIN BUNDLE *********************************** Receive one copy of the Kickstarter Exclusive Edition of Perdition’s Mouth: Abyssal Rift, with all unlocked goals. ALSO RECEIVE THE FOLLOWING ADD-ONS: Hero Trait Cards, the World Book, the Hideout expansion, and the new set of Portcullis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Lever miniatures.
This is for the Kickstarter Deluxe Edition. Includes all stretch goals. Shipping weight is about 12 pounds.
This is for the Kickstarter Deluxe Edition. Includes all stretch goals. Shipping weight is about 12 pounds.

KS deluxe version with stretch goals which includes Witch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Grotto expansion + wound promo deck. Played once, some cards still in shrink Box corner has a slight dent/crumple, one mini broken in middle due to not enough glue from factory which is supposed to be an easy fix, and one broken weapon. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not a minis person to fix these on my own. Happy to send pictures. Open to trades and price is a little negotiable Will accept paypal and Amazon

Kickstarter copy with stretch goals + Witch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Grotto expansion. Does not include paid add-ons. One figure was snapped at the ankles upon arrival. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve repaired it and it looks like new. Otherwise, played a few times in a smoke-free environment. Components are like-new. Excellent game! It fills a niche similar to Gloomhaven (Euro-like dungeon crawler), but with a somewhat more intricate/thinky system, though without the evolving background (it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s more like a branching campaign). There is a ton of gameplay here and it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s good solo.

GAMER’S BARGAIN BUNDLE *********************************** Receive one copy of the Kickstarter Exclusive Edition of Perdition’s Mouth: Abyssal Rift, with all unlocked goals. ALSO RECEIVE THE FOLLOWING ADD-ONS: Hero Trait Cards, the World Book, the Hideout expansion, and the new set of Portcullis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Lever miniatures.
Kickstarter Exclusive edition with all the stretchgoals and the Witches Grotto Expansion. Only played once.

Like new and complete- retail edition with no Kickstarter bonuses. Shipping Expected to be $20- big, heavy box!
opened and looked at. cards etc still sealed

This is the Bargain Bundle (also referred to as Gamer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Bundle) from the KS campaign, plus the Wound Deck Add-On. In other words, this is a complete package of everything available for the game. The Witch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Grotto, The Hideout, the KS exclusives and extras, all of it. The shrink on the box has been removed and the Victim in a Cage mini has been assembled, but the game contents are otherwise untouched/unpunched/wrapped. One corner of the box top has mild crushing. The box is huge and heavy, so expect higher shipping.

This is for the Kickstarter Exclusive Edition. It includes all free stretch goals achieved during the first Kickstarter campaign, plus the Witch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Grotto Expansion and Mogba_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;gh character bundle. It does not include the Hideout expansion. It is missing one promo Wound card from the Mogba_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;gh character bundle. The game developer has promised to replace this card (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Hallucination_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;) once they have spares available. You will need to contact the game developer yourself after you purchase the game. The game has been opened to inventory the contents but has not been played. $15 shipping within the continental US. If I can ship it for less, I will refund the difference.

This is for the Kickstarter Deluxe Edition. Includes all stretch goals achieved during the Kickstarter campaign, plus the Witch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Grotto Expansion. Please note that this edition doe NOT contain the Hideout Expansion or the Mogba_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;gh character. Free shipping within the Continental US.

This is a new, sealed retail copy of Perdition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Mouth: Abyssal Rift...I bought it a few months ago, and never got round to opening it, so it is unopened and unused...I have just splashed out on the Gamers Bundle, and so this is now surplus to requirements... Because of the weight, I will only be able to ship this within the UK...And also because of the weight (7Kg when parcelled up), shipping is £9 fully insured... Pictures above are of the actual item. If you have any questions, please feel free to ask...

Played a few times. In a very good condition. Retail version Shipping to Germany 6€.
Many components unplayed, including all tokens still unpunched, but some components (eg cards) played with.

Full Kickstarter Gamer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition of Perdition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Mouth: Abyssal Rift with the whole nine yards: - all the extra minis - Witches Grotto expansion - Hideout Expansion

For user Dennis Sison only! Retail kickstarter version. In other words its retail with some minor extra stuff added like an extra character. There were production issues (I talked to the designer about this) so it may say or look like its a full on kickstarter edition but it isnt despite having the incomplete components for it (ex. it says it has the expansion but it is a misprint) One flimsy mini has a broken cage because, well, it was flimsy in the first place. It was already that when I opened it. Will listen to offers
Played twice, in excellent condition.
In great shape. Set up twice but never played. Comes with the Witche_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Grotto expansion. Very big box. $15 shipping West of the Mississippi. $20 East of the Mississippi.
+ shipping

Contents: Kickstarter Edition _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Deluxe _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Edition Perdition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Mouth: Abyssal Rift. Includes core game plus the Kickstarter game edition of the Perdition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Mouth, with Witch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s grotto game expansion and all stretch goals (including the Kickstarter Exclusive stretch goals). This includes PM:AR from 1st print plus upgrade kit from 2nd print + Witch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Grotto expansion + KS content like wound deck, doors, etc... Brand new copy, unwrapped but unpunched, never played, from smoke free, pet free, kids free house. Shipment not included.
